title: BRIEF-China Hanking Says Unit Made Offer To Acquire Coolgardie Gold Project From Focus Minerals
text:
BRIEF-China Hanking Says Unit Made Offer To Acquire Coolgardie Gold Project From Focus Minerals

Commodities 6 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 21:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-China Hanking Says Unit Made Offer To Acquire Coolgardie Gold Project From Focus Minerals Sept 23 (Reuters) - China Hanking Holdings Ltd : * UNIT MADE NON-BINDING INDICATIVE CASH OFFER TO ACQUIRE 100% INTEREST OF COOLGARDIE GOLD PROJECT FROM FOCUS MINERALS * TOTAL CONSIDERATION IN NON-BINDING INDICATIVE CASH OFFER IS A$56 MILLION TO A$65 MILLION

BRIEF-China Hanking Says Unit Made Offer To Acquire Coolgardie Gold Project From Focus Minerals
description: BRIEF-China Hanking Says Unit Made Offer To Acquire Coolgardie Gold Project From Focus Minerals
